content.raw: That I haven't checkt till now it but your example shows that it doesn't seem to be all errors. It happened a few times now and thats why I reported it. I'll take a look at the lyse.log tomorrow when I'm in the lab and look for the traceback (we had one of those 'no more plots' errors just this afternoon)
